data.title: KCCV 2025
data.description: Lab members attended the Korean Conference on Computer Vision (KCCV 2025) on August 4-6.

data.title: Year-Start Dinner

data.title: NeurIPS 2024
data.description: Jiwoong, Daehwan, and Junho attended the Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS) 2024 in Vancouver, Canada. NeurIPS is one of the world's top AI conferences.

data.title: ICPR 2024
data.description: Junho attended the 27th International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR 2024) in Kolkata, India, where he presented a poster. He looked great in traditional Indian attire!

data.title: Medical AI Competition
data.description: Jiwoong, Daehwan, and Junho participated in the 1st Medical AI Competition, organized by Korea University Medical Center, Korea University College of Medicine, and the Korea University BK21 Convergence Translational Medical Science Education Research Group. They achieved 3rd place and received the Korea University BK21 Convergence Translational Medical Science Education Research Group Award. Congratulations!

data.title: ICMRI 2024
data.description: Geonwoo, Seohyun, and Ikbeom attended the 12th International Congress on MRI & 29th Annual Scientific Meeting of KSMRM (ICMRI 2024) in Seoul, Korea. Geonwoo presented a poster.

data.title: Year-End Dinner
data.description: We had a gathering to wrap up the year 2024. Everyone worked hard this yearâ€”great job!

data.title: KCCV 2024
data.description: Nine lab members attended the 11th Korean Conference on Computer Vision (KCCV 2024) in Busan, Korea. We also enjoyed a yacht party togetherâ€”it was a fantastic experience!

data.title: Pizza Day
